nodes.bodyText:
I suggest adding "transparent" here as the border-color because the initial value of border is currentcolor, which defaults to the value of color. This could lead to unintentional solid borders displaying around items.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color#Formal_definition
Suggested change
Can this :active rule be merged into the other :active rule a few lines above?
Should this be "...hidden-active-border-left"?
Should this be "...selected-active-border-left"?
"ppurpleefined"?

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             - `_defaults.scss`, having `_` character at the begining, will not compile into a css file. This file is the place where all the default variables needed to create the UI and not related to your Sakai brand or theme are placed. In previous releases, it was common to edit this file, now it is recommended not to edit and instead edit `sass/themes/_light.scss` or `sass/themes/_custom.scss` If we just want to modify this features but we don't want to lose the content of this file cloned from *git* we just need to create a file named `_customization.scss` which will contain our modified variables.
